title: Big Wos on Draymond, Dissecting Kyrie's Enigmatic Personality, and The Scottish Hammer
description:
Bomani Jones and Wosny Lambre of The Ringer discuss why they were surprised that the video of the Draymond Green punch got out (6:28), the impact of Joe Lacob running the Warriors like a business (17:13), the roots of Kyrie Irving’s persona (26:37), and the America that The Scottish Hammer walked into while in college (38:43). 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
